Uses of Package
ru.bit.torrent

  • Packages that use ru.bit.torrent 
    Package Description
    ru.bit.torrent  
    ru.gui  
  • Classes in ru.bit.torrent used by ru.bit.torrent 
    Class and Description
    BencodingException 
    FileAccess
    This class is used to interact with the file we're downloading to/ uploading from - it contains methods to read and write specific pieces from the file.
    Manager
    This class handles the overall flow of the application.
    Message
    Message class represents a Peer-to-Peer message in the protocol (Unchoke, Interested, Piece, etc.).
    MessageHandler
    This class is used to facilitate communication between a "Manager" and each one of its' peers; that is, for every Peer that Manager wants to connect to, a new MessageHandler is created.
    MessageSender
    MessageSender is a thread instantiated in every MessageHandler who's duty is to send out all the messages in a given peer's queue.
    Peer
    Peer class contains all the states and methods associated with a "peer" as defined in the BitTorrent protocol.
    PerformanceAnalyzer 
    PieceMessage
    piece: The piece message is variable length, where X is the length of the block.
    RequestMessage 
    SocketListener 
    TorrentInfo
    This is a data structure class that extracts basic information from a bencoded torrent metainfo file and stores it in public fields.  Note that this class only works for torrent metainfo files for a single-file torrent.
    Tracker 
    TrackerStats 
  • Classes in ru.bit.torrent used by ru.gui 
    Class and Description
    Manager
    This class handles the overall flow of the application.
    Peer
    Peer class contains all the states and methods associated with a "peer" as defined in the BitTorrent protocol.
